name: kizuna
description:
Kizuna is a short level-based fun but not-that-easy game. Two characters are bound together by a line. You can switch between the two characters to reach the flag and win the game! 

This game has been done in 48h during the GameMaker's ToolKit (GMTK) Game Jam 21. All the Game Design, Game Programming, Game Art, and Game Music were done by me! (*proud*)

Commands:

To Move: Arrow Keys

To Switch Character: Space

Menu: Esc
